com.mozilla.secops

Class IprepdIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mozilla.secops.IprepdIO

  • public class IprepdIO
extends Object
    IprepdIO provides an IO transform for writing violation messages to iprepd

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IprepdIO.Reader 
      static class  IprepdIO.ReputationValue
      A reputation response from iprepd
      static class  IprepdIO.WhitelistedObject
      WhitelistedObject contains the metadata associated with a whitelisted objects.
      static class  IprepdIO.Write
      Write violation messages to iprepd based on submitted Alert JSON strings

    • Method Detail

      • getReader

        public static IprepdIO.Reader getReader(String iprepdSpec,
                                        String project)
        Return a new reader for reading reputation from iprepd

        Specification format: url|api key

        Example: "https://iprepd.example.com|secretapikey"

        The specification processor supports RuntimeSecrets, and may therefore also be a cloudkms:// URL or a GCS URL.

        Parameters:
        iprepdSpec - iprepd input specification
        project - GCP project name, only required if decrypting apiKey via cloudkms
        Returns:
        Reader

      • writeSpecs

        public static IprepdIO.Write writeSpecs(String[] iprepdSpecs,
                                        String project)
        Return PTransform to emit violations to one or more instances of iprepd

        Specification format: url|api key

        Example: "https://iprepd.example.com|secretapikey"

        The specification processor supports RuntimeSecrets, and may therefore also be a cloudkms:// URL or a GCS URL.

        Parameters:
        iprepdSpecs - String[] of iprepd input specifications
        project - GCP project name, only required if decrypting apiKey via cloudkms
        Returns:
        IO transform

      • addMetadataSuppressRecovery

        public static void addMetadataSuppressRecovery(Integer value,
                                               Alert a)
        Add iprepd recovery suppression metadata to an alert
        Parameters:
        value - Seconds for recovery suppression
        a - Alert

      • addMetadataIfIpWhitelisted

        public static void addMetadataIfIpWhitelisted(String ip,
                                              Alert a)
                                       throws IOException
        Add whitelisted IP metadata if the IP address is whitelisted.
        Parameters:
        ip - IP address to check
        a - Alert to add metadata to
        Throws:
        IOException - IOException

      • addMetadataIfIpWhitelisted

        public static void addMetadataIfIpWhitelisted(String ip,
                                              Alert a,
                                              String datastoreProject)
                                       throws IOException
        Add whitelisted IP metadata if the IP address is whitelisted.

        This variant allows specification of a project ID, for cases where the datastore instance lives in another GCP project.

        Parameters:
        ip - IP address to check
        a - Alert to add metadata to
        datastoreProject - If Datastore is in another project, non-null project ID
        Throws:
        IOException - IOException

      • addMetadataIfObjectWhitelisted

        public static void addMetadataIfObjectWhitelisted(String obj,
                                                  String type,
                                                  Alert a)
                                           throws IOException
        Add whitelisted metadata if the object is whitelisted.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to check (usually an IP or email)
        type - Type of object (usually "ip" or "email")
        a - Alert to add metadata to
        Throws:
        IOException - IOException

      • addMetadataIfObjectWhitelisted

        public static void addMetadataIfObjectWhitelisted(String obj,
                                                  String type,
                                                  Alert a,
                                                  String datastoreProject)
                                           throws IOException
        Add whitelisted metadata if the object is whitelisted.

        This variant allows specification of a project ID, for cases where the datastore instance lives in another GCP project.

        If for some reason the whitelist state lookup fails, an IOException will be thrown.

        Parameters:
        obj - Object to check (usually an IP or email)
        type - Type of object (usually "ip" or "email")
        a - Alert to add metadata to
        datastoreProject - If Datastore is in another project, non-null project ID
        Throws:
        IOException - IOException
